    • Uses of Counters in ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure

      Methods in ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure that return Counters 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Counters Decision.getChoiceModifiers()
      This reflects updates to the Stories counters that will occur when following a link
      Counters Story.getPlayerStats()
      get the players current counter state
      Methods in ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure with parameters of type Counters 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ApplicationController.initializeNewStory(java.lang.String storyTitle, Counters playerStats, boolean state)
      This function is a generalized class for creating and initializing a new story and placing it on the server
      void Counters.invokeUpdateComplex(Counters choiceModifiers)
      This method updates all stats in a stats-based fighting fragment
      void Counters.invokeUpdateSimple(Counters choiceModifiers)
      Similar to the above method, this updates the model, but only the basic counters not used in fighting
      void Decision.setChoiceModifiers(Counters choiceModifiers)
      This reflects updates to the Stories counters that will occur when following a link
      void Story.setPlayerStats(Counters playerStats)
      Sets the players counter state
      void Decision.updateDecision(java.lang.String text, Page page, Counters counter)
      Basically a setter for the variables of Decision, however it requires that you set both the text and the destination page at the same time.
      void PageController.updateDecision(java.lang.String text, Page page, int whichDecision, Counters counter)
      Updates a decision in the model
      void Page.updateDecisionFight(java.lang.String text, Page page, int decisionNumber, Counters counter)
      Update the decision of this page at the passed position with the passed text and page reference
